name: offers examples to help you practice test automation
title: offers examples to help you practice test automation

testSteps.description: John - API Tester ensures all GitHub systems are operational

children.description: John - API Tester sends a GET request to 'https://www.githubstatus.com/api/v2/status.json'

restQuery.requestHeaders:
Accept: application/json, text/plain, */*
User-Agent: axios/1.5.1
Accept-Encoding: gzip, compress, deflate, br

content-type: application/json; charset=utf-8
content-length: 215
connection: close
date: Sat, 14 Oct 2023 23:09:26 GMT

strict-transport-security: max-age=259200

children.description: John - API Tester ensures that the status of the last response does equal 200
John - API Tester ensures that GitHub Status does equal 'All Systems Operational'

testSteps.description: Wendy - Acceptance Tester starts with a list containing 3 items

children.description: Wendy - Acceptance Tester creates an empty todo list
Wendy - Acceptance Tester navigates to 'https://todo-app.serenity-js.org/'
Wendy - Acceptance Tester ensures that website title does equal 'Serenity/JS TodoApp'
Wendy - Acceptance Tester waits until "What needs to be done?" input box does become visible
Wendy - Acceptance Tester empties local storage if needed
Wendy - Acceptance Tester checks whether <<persisted items>>.length does have value greater than 0
Wendy - Acceptance Tester records an item called 'Buy dog food'
Wendy - Acceptance Tester enters 'Buy dog food' into "What needs to be done?" input box
Wendy - Acceptance Tester presses key Enter in "What needs to be done?" input box
Wendy - Acceptance Tester waits until the text of displayed items does contain 'Buy dog food'
Wendy - Acceptance Tester records an item called 'Feed the dog'
Wendy - Acceptance Tester enters 'Feed the dog' into "What needs to be done?" input box
Wendy - Acceptance Tester presses key Enter in "What needs to be done?" input box
Wendy - Acceptance Tester waits until the text of displayed items does contain 'Feed the dog'
Wendy - Acceptance Tester records an item called "Book a vet's appointment"
Wendy - Acceptance Tester enters "Book a vet's appointment" into "What needs to be done?" input box
Wendy - Acceptance Tester presses key Enter in "What needs to be done?" input box
Wendy - Acceptance Tester waits until the text of displayed items does contain "Book a vet's appointment"

testSteps.description: Wendy - Acceptance Tester marks the following items as completed: [ 'Buy dog food', 'Feed the dog' ]

children.description: Wendy - Acceptance Tester marks an item called 'Buy dog food' as completed
Wendy - Acceptance Tester checks whether CSS classes of an item called 'Buy dog food' does not contain 'completed'
Wendy - Acceptance Tester toggles the completion status of an item called 'Buy dog food'
Wendy - Acceptance Tester clicks on toggle button of an item called 'Buy dog food'
Wendy - Acceptance Tester marks an item called 'Feed the dog' as completed
Wendy - Acceptance Tester checks whether CSS classes of an item called 'Feed the dog' does not contain 'completed'
Wendy - Acceptance Tester toggles the completion status of an item called 'Feed the dog'
Wendy - Acceptance Tester clicks on toggle button of an item called 'Feed the dog'

testSteps.description: Wendy - Acceptance Tester ensures that number of items left does equal 1
